author: Simon Difford
description: The pungent flavours of naval rum contribute to this tasty, fruity rum punch and will warm your cockles – m' hearties!
name: Nelson's Blood No.2
recipeIngredient: 12.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass

video.description: The pungent flavours of naval rum contribute to this tasty, fruity rum punch and will warm your cockles – m' hearties!
video.name: HOWTO make Nelson's Blood No.2
